translations.translation: but also that My punishment is the Painful Punishment.
But My punishment is surely a painful one.
At the same time, My chastisement is highly painful.
and that My punishment is a painful one.

And that My torment is indeed the most painful torment.
And that My punishment-- that is the painful punishment.
and that My chastisement is the painful chastisement.
And that My doom is the dolorous doom.

and that My punishment is a painful punishment.

And that My punishment is the painful punishment.

[15:50] and that My chastisement, of those who are disobedient, is the painful chastisement.
(And that My doom is the dolorous doom) the painful doom for the one who does not repent and dies in a state of disbelief.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } أي: محنة وعناء حتى يشوشوا بها { وَمَا هُمْ مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِينَ } نبئهم أيضاً { أَنَّ عَذَابِي } وانتقامي وبطشي على من أصر على عنادي، واستمر على ترك طاعتي وانقيادي { هُوَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ٱلأَلِيمُ } [الحجر: 50] المؤلم المستمر الذي لا نجاة لأحد فيه
